analysis.description:
bet_various.finish (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#133-160) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- developer.transfer(remain) (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#150-151)

bet_various.findWinners (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#64-92) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastdiff == uint256(diff)

bet_various.finish has external calls inside a loop:
	- winner.transfer(prize) (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#142)

bet_various.findWinners (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#64-92) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- diff < 0 (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#74-75)
	- lastdiff > uint256(diff) (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#75-80)
	- lastdiff == uint256(diff) (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#85-90)
	- diff < 0 (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#84)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.7 (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_contenders' of bet_various.setBettingCondition (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#46) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_bettingprice' of bet_various.setBettingCondition (/unique_chucks/38/0x51775965e3e941baf55f616696e1f7393cfb5cf0.sol#46-47) is not in mixedCase
